select esti.seq_id, estimate_id, esti.partner_id, esti.partner_nm , esti.brand_nm, esti.jan_cd, esti.prd_cd, esti.prd_nm, esti.prd_prc , esti.dsku, esti.dasin, esti.tax_incld, esti.tax_rt, esti.std_info , date_format(esti.reg_dt, '%Y/%m/%d') reg_dt , prd.prd_unit_prc from estimate_info esti inner join jaiko_prd_info prd on prd.jan_cd = esti.jan_cd where esti.partner_id = #{partner_id}
and esti.prd_nm like '%${prd_nm}%'
and esti.jan_cd like '%${jan_cd}%'
order by esti.reg_dt desc
mapper.insert: insert into estimate_info (partner_id, partner_nm, jan_cd, prd_nm, prd_prc) values (#{partner_id}, #{partner_nm}, #{jan_cd}, #{prd_nm}, #{prd_prc});
